name: OD27_5dim_module
title: OD27 fork of 5Dim's mod - New Module
author: 5Dim
description:
Modules for OD27 fork of 5Dim's mod
Adds a brand new merged modules and 10 tiers of the rest of the modules
This mod include:
- New pollution module
- New merged module that combine effect of all modules of this tier
- 10 tiers of all modules
- 10 tiers of beacons
